    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(int id,
           java.lang.String password,
           Kal2000 kal2000)
             throws PasswordException,
                    CardException
        Connect the client, if it's possible according informations he gives.
        Parameters:
        id - client's card number
        password - client's password
        kal2000 - KAL2000 engine
        Throws:
        PasswordException - when password doesn't match with id
        CardException - when no card have been found

      • connect

        void connect(Client client,
           Card card)
        Connect the client and his card.
        Parameters:
        client - the client
        card - client's card

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect the connected client.
